# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been designed to meet your needs and enhance your experience. With its advanced features and quality craftsmanship, it's truly a remarkable item. I'm extending this opportunity to you with an exclusive offer of $150, a special price tailored to appreciate your interest and consideration. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
